allow: Bash(winpty docker exec -it iran-market-db psql -U postgres -d iran_market_data)

Bash(winpty docker exec -it iran-market-db-v2 psql -U postgres -d iran_market_data -c "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''stock_symbols'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
